works.description: If you are one of those frequent wanderers who wish to experience the homely comfort while roaming around places, the Folding Sauna by Studio Elmo Vermijs seems to be a perfect thing. This mobile pop-up sauna project started back in 2010 with an idea to enjoy a sauna at various locations and in different environs. Whether you have plans to hit the woods, visit the deserts or enjoy festivities in faraway areas, the Folding Sauna will let you enjoy a complete comforting experience.
